project_name.justification: The title of the article is 'USCM Enters Into Exploration and Option Agreement on McDermitt Lithium East Project'.

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified in the first paragraph: 'US Critical Metals Corp. (CSE: USCM) (OTCQB: USCMF) (FSE: 0IU0) ("USCM " or the "Company ") is pleased to announce that it has, along with its wholly-owned subsidiary, US Energy Metals Corp. ("USEM "), entered into an Exploration and Option to Enter Joint Venture Agreement...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The contact information at the end of the article lists: 'Darren Collins Chief Executive Officer & Director'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement provides an option for a total of 75% interest through a two-stage process: '...providing the Company with the option to acquire up to a 50% interest in the Project and a further option to acquire an additional 25% interest for an aggregate total of 75% interest in the Project...'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is named the 'McDermitt Lithium East Project' and the text states, 'McDermitt Caldera is potentially the largest source of lithium clays in the world.'

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the McDermitt Lithium East Project, which is the project of interest.

currency.justification: The transaction terms consistently use 'CAD$' as the currency for payments and expenditures, for example: 'CAD$50,000 within 5 business days...' and 'initial CAD$1,500,000 in exploration expenditures'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of two conditional payments: CAD$50,000 upon CSE acceptance and CAD$100,000 after the second year. 'CAD$50,000 within 5 business days after the CSE's acceptance of the Option Agreement; if USEM elects to continue the Option Agreement in effect after the Second Year Deadline, CAD$100,000 within 10 business days after the Second Year Deadline'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The total share payment value is the sum of three components required to earn the full 75% interest: CAD$100,000, CAD$200,000, and CAD$1,000,000. 'Shares having a value of CAD$100,000 on the CSE's acceptance...'; 'Shares having a value of CAD$200,000 within 10 business days after the Second Year Deadline.'; and to get the additional 25% interest, 'by issuing Shares having a value of CAD$1,000,000 within 10 business days after the Additional Earn-in Deadline.'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Separate cash and share payment values are provided, so this field is null per the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The value of shares to be issued is specified, but not the number of shares.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: Share warrants are not mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: Options are not mentioned as a form of payment in the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The number of shares to be issued is not specified, so a price per share cannot be determined from the deal terms.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is specified as a monetary value, not in meters of drilling.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The total exploration commitment to earn the full 75% interest is the sum of CAD$4,500,000 (for the first 50%) and CAD$5,000,000 (for the next 25%). '...an initial CAD$1,500,000... and an additional CAD$3,000,000... for a total of CAD$4,500,000...' and 'incurring and paying additional exploration expenditures in the amount of CAD$5,000,000'.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller (LVH) retains a royalty if its interest is diluted: 'If at any time LVH's participating interest in the joint venture is diluted to below 10%, LVH's interest will be deemed to have been withdrawn and been converted into a 3.0% net smelter returns mineral production royalty.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Project Overview section states: 'The Project spans 6,508 acres of BLM claims and is located within the McDermitt Caldera...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Project Overview section states: 'The Project spans 6,508 acres of BLM claims and is located within the McDermitt Caldera...'

resource_size.justification: The article does not state a mineral resource for the McDermitt Lithium East project. It mentions a resource for a nearby, different project: 'Thacker Pass, which is the largest known lithium deposit in the US and one of the largest in the world with 3.7 million tonnes of lithium carbonate equivalent reserves'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's name is followed by its ticker and exchange in the first paragraph: 'US Critical Metals Corp. (CSE: USCM)'.
